content: bernat® felting natural wool 75 g/2 6 oz 77 m/84 yards 2 balls for all sizes *ed note if you are substituting another yarn it must be 100% feltable wool if you plan to felt the project * size 6 5 mm u s k or 10½ crochet hook toe is worked in rounds foot and heel are worked in row sew heel seams and felt to finish knit version easy knit slippers to felt #720 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/easy-knit-slippers-to-felt-720
